title: Jugglers, from a photography album with images of Japan
description: seated young girl at left and man with moustache at right; both figures hold a closed fan in their PR hand and wear brocade costumes with exaggerated shoulders; girl wears purple kimono, man wears grey kimono
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
